code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SkillPlanner(_ref){let{skills,onAdd,onSetPriority}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState('');const submit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!name)return;onAdd({name});setName('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mb-4",children:"Priority Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:submit,style:{display:'flex',gap:8,marginBottom:16},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"New skill to master...",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary btn-sm",children:"Add"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-list",children:[skills.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"muted text-center",style:{padding:'12px 0'},children:"No skills listed."}),skills.map((s,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-name",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"muted",style:{marginRight:8},children:[idx+1,"."]}),s.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-sm",onClick:()=>onSetPriority(s.id,'up'),title:"Move up",disabled:idx===0,children:"\u2191"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-sm",onClick:()=>onSetPriority(s.id,'down'),title:"Move down",disabled:idx===skills.length-1,children:"\u2193"})]})]},s.id))]})]});}
